SELECT MAIN.CONT_TRACK_ID CONT_TRACK_ID ,MAIN.CONT_TRACK_NO CONT_TRACK_NO ,MAIN.CONT_REF_NO CONTRACT_REF_NO ,MAIN.CONT_TYPE ,MAIN.CONT_TYPE_OTHER ,MAIN.CONT_NAME CONTRACT_NAME ,MAIN.CONT_DATE ,TO_CHAR(MAIN.CRT_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') CRT_DT ,MAIN.CRT_USER_ID ,TO_CHAR(MAIN.UPD_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') UPD_DT ,MAIN.UPD_USER_ID ,TO_CHAR(MAIN.CONT_COMM_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') COMM_DT ,TO_CHAR(MAIN.CONT_EXPIRY_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') EXP_DT ,MAIN.RENEWAL_CYCLE RENEWAL_CYCLE ,DET.DEPT_NAME CONTRACT_OWNER ,DET.VEN_NAME VENDOR_NAME FROM SAL0413M MAIN LEFT JOIN SAL0414D DET ON DET.CONT_TRACK_ID = MAIN.CONT_TRACK_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M CONTTYPE ON CONTTYPE.CODE_ID = MAIN.CONT_TYPE AND CONTTYPE.CODE_MASTER_ID = 577 LEFT JOIN SYS0047M CRTUSER ON CRTUSER.USER_ID = MAIN.CRT_USER_ID WHERE MAIN.STATUS <> 8
AND UPPER(MAIN.CONT_REF_NO) LIKE UPPER(#{sContractRefNo}) || '%'
AND to_date(TO_CHAR(MAIN.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE(#{_createdFrDt},'DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE(#{_createdEndDt},'DD/MM/YYYY')
AND CRTUSER.USER_NAME = UPPER(#{sCreatedBy})
AND CONTTYPE.CODE IN
#{item}
AND MAIN.CONT_TERM = #{sContractTerm}
AND to_date(TO_CHAR(MAIN.CONT_COMM_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE(#{_contComFrDt},'DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE(#{_contComeEndDt},'DD/MM/YYYY')
AND MAIN.CONT_STATUS IN
#{item}
AND UPPER(DET.DEPT_NAME) LIKE UPPER(#{sOwnerDept}) || '%'
AND UPPER(DET.DEPT_EMAIL) LIKE UPPER(#{sDeptEmal}) || '%'
AND UPPER(DET.PIC_NAME) LIKE UPPER(#{sDeptPic}) || '%'
AND UPPER(DET.VEN_NAME) LIKE UPPER(#{sVendorName}) || '%'
AND DET.VEN_NRIC LIKE #{sVendorNric} || '%'
AND UPPER(DET.VEN_PIC_EMAIL) LIKE UPPER(#{sVendorEmail}) || '%'
ORDER BY MAIN.CONT_TRACK_ID

SELECT 'CO' || TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') || MAX(CONT_TRACK_NO) AS CLM_NO FROM ( SELECT NVL (TO_CHAR (MAX (SUBSTR (CONT_TRACK_NO, 7, 4) + 1), 'FM0000'), '0001') AS CONT_TRACK_NO FROM SAL0413M WHERE SUBSTR (CONT_TRACK_NO, 3, 4) = TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yymm') )

MERGE INTO SAL0413M TARG USING ( SELECT #{contTrackId} CONT_TRACK_ID ,#{contTrackNo} CONT_TRACK_NO ,#{contractRefNo} CONT_REF_NO ,#{contractType} CONT_TYPE ,#{contractOtherRem} CONT_TYPE_OTHER ,#{contractName} CONT_NAME ,TO_DATE(#{_contractDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') CONT_DATE ,#{atchFileGrpId} ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,#{contractTermY} CONT_TERM_YEAR ,#{contractTermM} CONT_TERM_MONTH ,TO_DATE(#{_contractCommDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') CONT_COMM_DT ,TO_DATE(#{_contractExpDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') CONT_EXPIRY_DT
,#{contractStus} CONT_STATUS
,#{isOptToRenew} IS_OPT_RENEW ,#{numRenewCycle} RENEWAL_CYCLE ,SYSDATE CRT_DT ,#{userId} CRT_USER_ID ,SYSDATE UPD_DT ,#{userId} UPD_USER_ID , NVL(#{sContStatus},1) STATUS FROM DUAL ) SOURC ON (SOURC.CONT_TRACK_ID = TARG.CONT_TRACK_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET TARG.CONT_REF_NO = SOURC.CONT_REF_NO ,TARG.CONT_TYPE = SOURC.CONT_TYPE ,TARG.CONT_TYPE_OTHER = SOURC.CONT_TYPE_OTHER ,TARG.CONT_NAME = SOURC.CONT_NAME ,TARG.CONT_DATE = SOURC.CONT_DATE ,TARG.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID = SOURC.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,TARG.CONT_TERM_YEAR = SOURC.CONT_TERM_YEAR ,TARG.CONT_TERM_MONTH = SOURC.CONT_TERM_MONTH ,TARG.CONT_COMM_DT = SOURC.CONT_COMM_DT ,TARG.CONT_EXPIRY_DT = SOURC.CONT_EXPIRY_DT
,TARG.CONT_STATUS = SOURC.CONT_STATUS
,TARG.IS_OPT_RENEW = SOURC.IS_OPT_RENEW ,TARG.RENEWAL_CYCLE = SOURC.RENEWAL_CYCLE ,TARG.UPD_DT = SOURC.UPD_DT ,TARG.UPD_USER_ID = SOURC.UPD_USER_ID ,TARG.STATUS = SOURC.STATUS WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( CONT_TRACK_ID ,CONT_TRACK_NO ,CONT_REF_NO ,CONT_TYPE ,CONT_TYPE_OTHER ,CONT_NAME ,CONT_DATE ,ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,CONT_TERM_YEAR ,CONT_TERM_MONTH ,CONT_COMM_DT ,CONT_EXPIRY_DT
,CONT_STATUS
,IS_OPT_RENEW ,RENEWAL_CYCLE ,CRT_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ) VALUES ( SOURC.CONT_TRACK_ID ,SOURC.CONT_TRACK_NO ,SOURC.CONT_REF_NO ,SOURC.CONT_TYPE ,SOURC.CONT_TYPE_OTHER ,SOURC.CONT_NAME ,SOURC.CONT_DATE ,SOURC.ATCH_FILE_GRP_ID ,SOURC.CONT_TERM_YEAR ,SOURC.CONT_TERM_MONTH ,SOURC.CONT_COMM_DT ,SOURC.CONT_EXPIRY_DT
,SOURC.CONT_STATUS
,SOURC.IS_OPT_RENEW ,SOURC.RENEWAL_CYCLE ,SOURC.CRT_DT ,SOURC.CRT_USER_ID )

MERGE INTO SAL0414D TARG USING ( SELECT #{contTrackId} CONT_TRACK_ID ,#{deptName} DEPT_NAME ,#{deptEmail} DEPT_EMAIL ,#{picName} PIC_NAME ,#{picEmail} PIC_EMAIL ,#{vendorName} VEN_NAME ,#{vendorNric} VEN_NRIC ,#{vendorType} VEN_TYPE ,#{vendorOtherRem} VEN_TYPE_OTHER ,#{vendorPicName} VEN_PIC_NAME ,#{vendorPicEmail} VEN_PIC_EMAIL ,#{vendorPicNo} VEN_PIC_NO ,SYSDATE CRT_DT ,#{userId} CRT_USER_ID ,SYSDATE UPD_DT ,#{userId} UPD_USER_ID FROM DUAL ) SOURC ON (SOURC.CONT_TRACK_ID = TARG.CONT_TRACK_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET TARG.DEPT_NAME = SOURC.DEPT_NAME ,TARG.DEPT_EMAIL = SOURC.DEPT_EMAIL ,TARG.PIC_NAME = SOURC.PIC_NAME ,TARG.PIC_EMAIL = SOURC.PIC_EMAIL ,TARG.VEN_NAME = SOURC.VEN_NAME ,TARG.VEN_NRIC = SOURC.VEN_NRIC ,TARG.VEN_TYPE = SOURC.VEN_TYPE ,TARG.VEN_TYPE_OTHER = SOURC.VEN_TYPE_OTHER ,TARG.VEN_PIC_NAME = SOURC.VEN_PIC_NAME ,TARG.VEN_PIC_EMAIL = SOURC.VEN_PIC_EMAIL ,TARG.VEN_PIC_NO = SOURC.VEN_PIC_NO ,TARG.UPD_DT = SOURC.UPD_DT ,TARG.UPD_USER_ID = SOURC.UPD_USER_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( CONT_TRACK_ID ,DEPT_NAME ,DEPT_EMAIL ,PIC_NAME ,PIC_EMAIL ,VEN_NAME ,VEN_NRIC ,VEN_TYPE ,VEN_TYPE_OTHER ,VEN_PIC_NAME ,VEN_PIC_EMAIL ,VEN_PIC_NO ,CRT_DT ,CRT_USER_ID ) VALUES ( SOURC.CONT_TRACK_ID ,SOURC.DEPT_NAME ,SOURC.DEPT_EMAIL ,SOURC.PIC_NAME ,SOURC.PIC_EMAIL ,SOURC.VEN_NAME ,SOURC.VEN_NRIC ,SOURC.VEN_TYPE ,SOURC.VEN_TYPE_OTHER ,SOURC.VEN_PIC_NAME ,SOURC.VEN_PIC_EMAIL ,SOURC.VEN_PIC_NO ,SOURC.CRT_DT ,SOURC.CRT_USER_ID )
